title: Pixel 5 - SIM Manager repeatedly crashing issue
content:
Pixel 5
Android version: 11
Build: RQ1C.210205.006
Bought phone today. Processed all updates.

SIM Manager app is crashing repeatedly.  Since I use and eSim, this can't be a good thing.
The app crash popup will sometimes flash on the screen but most times stay on the screen until I force close the app.  The app crash popup appears again no more than 2 mins after a force close. 

After down grading the app to factory, I no longer get the crash popup message.  I can send and receive calls.
